name: Attuned_Synapses_Shock_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the Endurance Modification potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. Enhances your run speed by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%.
power_display_names: Synapse's Shock: Endurance Modification/Increased Run Speed
